scripts.stop:server: pm2 delete -s server-monitor || echo notfound server-monitor name
scripts.stop:ui: pm2 delete -s ui-monitor || echo notfound ui-monitor name
scripts.stop:app: npm run stop:server && npm run stop:ui
scripts.start:app: npm run start:server && npm run start:ui
scripts.start: npm run stop:app && npm run start:app && electron .
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
